name: Fury Ball - Destroy the falling blocks!
name_original: Fury Ball - Destroy the falling blocks!
description:
Hold your finger. Target the block. Throw your balls to destroy them all and survive the falling blocks!
How many blocks do you think you can break?

Easy to play. Hard to master.

Fury Ball is an addictive shoot’em up game where you have to explode as many blocks as you can using your infinite balls shooter.

Use as many balls as you need, there’re free and unlimited!
Beware some blocks are going faster than expected.
Don't forget to grab some power-ups to help you explode every block.
It’s pretty hard to reach high scores. Good luck ;)

Do you think you can break high scores of this simple game?
It’s time to find out!

Download now for FREE!

Game features:
◉ Free
◉ Easy gameplay
◉ Endless gameplay
◉ Collectible power-ups
◉ Offline friendly

Crafted with love under the sun of Montpellier and the freshness of French Alps by Pixel Rocket game studio.
